citations.title: Li Auto Inc. Hosts Family Tech Day
citations.summary: Li Auto Inc. has enhanced its HPC BEV technology by optimizing battery cells and upgrading its thermal management system, achieving a peak charging power exceeding 500 kW with a maximum 5C charging rate. The company is also developing its own 5C supercharging network and has announced plans for beta testing its city NOA autonomous driving feature in Beijing and Shanghai starting in June. As a leader in China's new energy vehicle market, Li Auto focuses on creating premium smart electric vehicles that prioritize safety, convenience, and comfort for families.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. July 2024 Delivery Update
citations.summary: Li Auto Inc. reported that the Li L6 model has consistently delivered over 20,000 units monthly, solidifying its position in the RMB200,000 to RMB300,000 market segment. The company launched OTA versions 6.0 and 6.1 in July, which included significant upgrades to the Li L series and Li MEGA, enhancing features related to autonomous driving, smart space, and electric capabilities. Additionally, Li Auto is testing an advanced architecture incorporating end-to-end models and vision-language models with around a thousand users, reflecting increased user interest in their autonomous driving technology.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. May 2025 Delivery Update
citations.summary: Li Auto Inc. reported delivering 40,856 vehicles in May 2025, marking a 16.7% year-over-year increase, with cumulative deliveries reaching 1,301,531 as of May 31, 2025. The company has recently completed a comprehensive upgrade of its entire model lineup, focusing on innovations in product, technology, and business model to enhance the safety, convenience, and comfort of its premium smart electric vehicles. Li Auto continues to lead in the commercialization of extended-range electric vehicles in China.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. Hosts 2024 Spring Launch Event
citations.summary: Li Auto Inc. launched its flagship family MPV, Li MEGA, at the 2024 Spring Launch Event, featuring an 800-volt battery electric platform. The vehicle is equipped with a Li Auto-CATL Qilin 5C battery, offering a total capacity of 102.7 kWh and a CLTC range of 710 kilometers. With Li Auto's 5C supercharging stalls, the Li MEGA can achieve a driving range of 500 kilometers after just a 12-minute charge, providing a refueling experience comparable to traditional internal combustion engine vehicles.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. November 2023 Delivery Update
citations.summary: Li Auto Inc. has introduced a voice assistant powered by its self-developed large model, designed to assist with driving, travel, and entertainment, while also serving educational purposes for younger passengers. The company has also implemented a new AC Eco mode utilizing its thermal management system and XCU controller, which enhances battery driving range by 15% to 20% in winter conditions. In November 2023, Li Auto delivered 41,030 vehicles, marking a 172.9% year-over-year increase, and surpassing its 2023 delivery target of 300,000 vehicles with a total of 325,677 deliveries year-to-date.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. February 2025 Delivery Update
citations.summary: In February 2025, Li Auto Inc. released OTA update version 7.1, enhancing its autonomous driving and smart space systems. The update improved the Li AD Max V13's performance in complex road conditions and introduced features like Sentry Mode High-Risk Video Remote Preview and Front Passenger Exit Alert. The company also revealed the exterior design of its first battery electric SUV.
